Record.ClassificationPath: Findings_and_Disorders_Kind/Disease, Disorder or Finding/Finding/Finding by Site or System/Cardiovascular System Finding/Pseudoaneurysm
Findings_and_Disorders_Kind/Disease, Disorder or Finding/Finding/Finding by Site or System/Cardiovascular System Finding/Aneurysm/Traumatic Aneurysm
Record.Description: Not an aneurysm but a well-defined collection of blood and CONNECTIVE TISSUE outside the wall of a blood vessel or the heart. It is the containment of a ruptured blood vessel or heart, such as sealing a rupture of the left ventricle. False aneurysm is formed by organized THROMBUS and HEMATOMA in surrounding tissue.
